alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 11 at 1:01PM MST until December 11 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts in the 50s. * WHERE...Camas Prairie, Grangeville and vicinity, Greer Grade, Highway 95 Slate Creek to Riggins, and White Bird Grade. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region
